August 14, 2013

Cameo in .net #245

I'm ready for my close-up, Mr. DeMille

Early July, Ian Devlin @iandevlin, was looking for some examples of recently launched websites built with HTML5 to be featured in the magazine's HTML5 gallery. I submitted de Standaard, a project I worked on, and it got accepted. Yay, my five minutes of glory. Kudos to the talented @stevenbenisek.

About .net

.net is the world’s best-selling magazine for web designers and developers, featuring tutorials from leading agencies, interviews with the web’s biggest names, and agenda-setting features on the hottest issues affecting the internet today.
